desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the International Conference on Advances in Security of Information and Communication Networks, Sec Net 2013, held in Cairo, Egypt, in September 2013. The 21 revised full papers presented were carefully reviewed and selected from 62 submissions. The papers are organized in topical sections on networking security; data and information security; authentication and privacy; security applications.

details.authors: Ali Ismail Awad, Aboul Ella Hassanien, Kensuke Baba

title: Advances in Security of Information and Communication Networks
